title: Inside this year's Oscar nominees goody bags... with goods worth $300k
text:
Inside this year's Oscar nominees goody bags... with goods worth $300k Even nominees who failed to win get to take home a haul of goodies Share How do we become actors? (Photo: Reuters) Share   
Not winning an Oscar must be a really depressing feeling, but the Academy have got failed nominees' backs. 
Even if you don't win an Oscar in an acting category despite being nominated, you still get to walk away with a gift bag worth hundreds of thousands of dollars. 
It's been 11 years since the first goody bag was handed out, and now they're full of gifts that total a whopping $260,000. 
No wonder Meryl Streep loves getting nominated so much. We'd be smiling too (Photo: Getty Images North America) Emma took home Best Actress (Photo: Splash News) 
In fact, the Devil Wear's Prada actress has taken home almost $800,000 dollars worth of goodies in recent years thanks to her seven nominations, according to Magic Freebies UK . 
This year, the bags included everything ranging from chap stick to a lifetime's supply of skincare. 
But the most expensive freebie ever given away was in a previous year, when nominees received a $55,000 10-night all inclusive vacation to Israel. 
We need an acting coach, right now. 
It comes as Jimmy Kimmel claimed that the Oscars Best Picture mishap was only second in terms of disasters over the weekend . Jimmy has revealed there was another mishap (Photo: ABC) 
The chat show host - who was at the helm for the ceremony and on stage during the incredibly awkward moment after La La Land was wrongly announced as the big winner - has revealed there was a very scary moment during rehearsals.
